round_best: Develop a hybrid kernel method combining the arc-cosine kernel with graph neural networks (GNNs) to enhance 3D reconstruction of oriented point clouds. The model would employ GNNs to capture local geometric structures efficiently within the point cloud, while the arc-cosine kernel handles the global orientation coherence. This integration could reduce computational complexity, accelerate processing speeds, and improve scalability by exploiting parallel processing capabilities inherent to graph-based approaches.
